snippet.title: Hot Springs | 温泉 (Onsen) - Launch trailer
snippet.description:
Immerse Yourself in Japan’s Hot Springs (Onsen), Create Your Own Garden, Nurture Pets & Fish, and Enjoy Relaxing Mini-Games
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2401730/Hot_Springs___Onsen/
Step into the serene world of Onsen, where the warm embrace of Japanese hot springs meets the ultimate idle simulation experience. Find peace and relaxation as you create your own slice of paradise, while also connecting with others. Enjoy a seamless blend of idle relaxation and engaging activities, perfectly balancing your downtime.
